definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[חָפׂה הַצָּפִית]] Is 21:5 they lay out the rug! or the like, so most moderns, v. [[חָפִית]]

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: overlay, plate: Pf. 3 ms. [[חִפָּה]] 1Ki 6:15 +; 2 ms. [[וְחִפִּיתָ֫]] Ex 25:11 +; Impf 3 ms. [[וַיְחַף]] 1Ki 6:20 +, sf. [[וַיְחַפֵּהוּ]] v:1Ki 6:20 +; 2 ms. [[תְּחַפֶּה]] Ex 29:29; 3 mpl. [[וַיְחַפּוּ]] 2Ch 3:10, etc.;—overlay, esp. plate sthg. with metal (gold, bronze), usu. 2 acc.: 1Ki 6:20, 1Ki 6:20 + 6 t. 1Ki 6, + 1Ki 10:18, ‖ 2Ch 3:4, 2Ch 3:10, 2Ch 4:9, 2Ch 9:17, Ex 25:11, Ex 25:13 + 21 t. Ex 25-38 (all P): overlay, stud with precious stones, 2 acc. 2Ch 3:6; also plate, acc. mater. om., 1Ki 6:15, 2Ki 18:16, Ex 25:11, Ex 38:28; acc. dir. obj., om. 1Ki 6:32, 1Ki 6:35; c. acc. + [[ב]] mater. v:1Ki 6:15 overlaid the floor of the house with timbers. †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְחֻפֶּה]] Pr 26:23 impure silver (Toy) laid over ([[עַל]]) a sherd; pl. [[מְחֻפִּים זׇהָב]] Ex 26:32, pillars over laid with gold.
